p: Even though the exact mechanisms of transmission are presently uncertain, human-to-human transmission can arise, and the risk of airborne spread appears imminent [ 3, 26]. Moreover, SARS-CoV may be transmitted from bats to palm civets or dromedary camels and thereby spill over into human beings [ 27- 28]. Reintroduction into human beings from an animal reservoir, persistent infection in previously sick people, or the laboratory strains may cause human infections and human-to-human transmission [ 29].
